messages.description: Usage message for the program. {0} is the program name.
messages.C: Usage: {0} [-l] [file...]

messages.description: Option -{0} is unrecognised.
messages.C: Option '-{0}' is not valid.

messages.description: Error whilst parsing file {0}, aborting.
messages.C: Abort: File system error whilst parsing '{0}'.

messages.description: Unexpected token {0}
messages.C: Unexpected token: '{0}'

messages.description: How to label an error
messages.C: Error

messages.description: Unexpected End-of-file whilst parsing a string
messages.C: Unexpected end of file encountered, whilst parsing a string.

messages.description: Unexpected End-of-file whilst parsing a comment
messages.C: Unexpected end of file encountered, whilst parsing a comment.

messages.description: The digit {0} is not in range for the base {1}
messages.C: Numeric digit {0} is not valid in base {1}.

messages.description: The token =- results in underfined behaviour, report it as an error.
messages.C: Token '=-' is not recognised.

messages.description: We expected a statement but instead got the token {0}
messages.C: Expected <statement>, found: {0}

messages.description: We expected a } but instead got the token {0}
messages.C: Expected '}}', found: {0}

messages.description: Expected a new line at the end of a semicolon list
messages.C: Expected new-line, found: {0}

messages.description: Expected an expression, found: {0}
messages.C: Expected <expression>, found: {0}

messages.description: Expected an assignment expression, found: {0}
messages.C: Expected <assignment expression>, found: {0}

messages.description: Expected a named expression, found: {0}
messages.C: Expected variable or array access, found: {0}

messages.description: Expected ']', found: {0}
messages.C: Expected ']', found: {0}

messages.description: Expected '(', found: {0}
messages.C: Expected '(', found: {0}

messages.description: Expected a ')', found: {0}
messages.C: Expected ')', found: {0}

messages.description: Expected a primary expression, found: {0}
messages.C: Expected primary expression, found: {0}

messages.description: Encountered a break when not in a loop
messages.C: Encountered break whilst not in a for/while loop.

messages.description: Expected an ';', found: {0}
messages.C: Expected ';', found: {0}

messages.description: Encountered a return statement outside of a function.
messages.C: Encountered a return statement outside of a function.

messages.description: Expected a letter, found: {0}
messages.C: Expected <letter>, found: {0}

messages.description: Expected a '{', found: {0}
messages.C: Expected '{', found: {0}

messages.description: Expected a newline, found: {0}
messages.C: Expected a newline, found: {0}

messages.description: Not allowed to nest function definitions
messages.C: Can't define one function inside another.

messages.description: Expected a semicolon or newline, found: {0}
messages.C: Expected a semicolon or newline, found: {0}

messages.description: Variable {0} appears more than once in the definition of a function.
messages.C: Repeated variable names in function definition: {0}

messages.description: Array {0} appears more than once in the definition of a function.
messages.C: Repeated array names in function definition: {0}[]

messages.description: Expected define list not: {0}
messages.C: Expected a list of variable and array names, found: {0}

messages.description: Expected define element not: {0}
messages.C: Expected a variable or array name, found: {0}

messages.description: Special variable {0} (ibase/obase - names are not translated) is out of range, should be [2, 16] we got {1}
messages.C: {0} set to an out of range value {1}.  Should be in range 2 <= {0} <= 16.

messages.description: Failed to convert number {0} to unsigned integer as it was negative.
messages.C: Cannot convert {0} to unsigned integer, as it is negative.

messages.description: Failed to convert number {0} to unsigned integer as it was fractional.
messages.C: Cannot convert {0} to unsigned integer, as it has a fraction component.

messages.description: Failed to convert number {0} to unsigned integer as it is too big.
messages.C: Cannot convert {0} to unsigned integer, as it is larger than the underlying type.

messages.description: Error:{0}:{1}:{2}: Function defined at location has no end of definition..
messages.C: Error:{0}:{1}:{2}: No end to function definition.
